title: 211 Lake County
description: This is the central access point for health and human service referrals in Lake County, providing 24-hour assistance. You can reach them by calling 2-1-1, texting your zip code to 898211, or visiting 211lakecounty.org.

title: PADS Lake County
description: PADS offers shelter, outreach, and support services to people experiencing homelessness in Lake County. Their year-round programs include emergency shelters and case management.

title: Northern Illinois Food Bank
description: Provides access to food and groceries for individuals and families in need. Find local food pantries or mobile markets near you on their website.

title: Love INC of Lake County
description: Love INC partners with local churches and agencies to provide essential items like furniture, clothing, and household goods to people in need. They also offer mentoring and support programs.

title: Community Action Partnership of Lake County
description: Provides housing assistance, energy bill support, employment training, and other essential services to low-income residents of Lake County.

title: Lake County Haven
description: A shelter and transitional housing program for women and children who are homeless. Offers supportive services to help residents regain independence.
